Class ArberChartBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.api.ArberChartBuilder
public final class ArberChartBuilder extends Object
Fluent builder for assembling an ArberChartPanel.

This is the recommended entry point for newcomers who want a concise, readable way to create charts: add one or more layers (model + renderer), optionally set a theme, and then build() the panel.

Framework contract: The builder does not mutate global state. The selected ChartTheme is applied to the created panel instance only.

Since:
2026-01-01
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Arber Gashi

    • withAnimations

      public ArberChartBuilder withAnimations(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables smooth animations for zoom and pan operations.
      Parameters:
      enabled - true to enable animations (default), false for instant updates.
      Returns:
      This builder for chaining.

    • withGridLayer

      public ArberChartBuilder withGridLayer(GridLayer gridLayer)
      Sets the grid layer used by the chart.

      The grid layer controls background grid style and is part of the chart composition. If not set, the ArberChartPanel default grid is used.

      Parameters:
      gridLayer - the grid layer to use; if null, the panel default grid is kept
      Returns:
      this builder for chaining

      Configures the Y-axis behavior and formatting.

      A configured ArberChartPanel.
